variable.description: ANY DISTINCT R ON T PVC

variable.name: B436
variable.value: OTHER (E.G.,AORTIC ROOT CALCIUM WITH NO VALUE AR CALCIUM, RV WALL THICKNESS INCREASED..>5MM=MAYBE, >=6MM=DEFINIT. OR COMBINATIONS OF THE ABOVE OTHER THAN THOSE SPECIFIED.
DYSRHYTHMIA POSSIBLY AFFECTING MOTION: AF, LBBB, LVCD (BUT NOT RBBB), PACEMAKER, JUNCTIONAL RHYTHM, SINUS PAUSES>1.5 SEC. (+-VPDS,SPDS SPDS,SVT, OR VT)
